svg:
```svg
<svg width="400" height="400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- 魚の頭 -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="100" rx="80" ry="60" fill="blue" />
  <!-- 馬の足 -->
  <rect x="150" y="200" width="30" height="100" fill="brown" />
  <rect x="220" y="200" width="30" height="100" fill="brown" />
  <!-- シマウマの模様 -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="100" r="50" fill="black" />
  <circle cx="170" cy="130" r="20" fill="white" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="130" r="20" fill="white" />
  <!-- ピカチュウのしっぽ -->
  <path d="M220 300 Q250 310 220 320" stroke="yellow" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
  <path d="M220 320 Q250 330 220 340" stroke="yellow" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
</svg>
```
